design4gree.title: Design4Green
design4gree.subtitle: Creating an accessible and eco-friendly website for Design4Green
design4gree.description: Eco-design of an accessible website using VueJS. The site showcases courses with search-based navigation or location-based navigation using an interactive map. Courses can be added to a cart and exported as PDF.

sploitableTools.title: SploitableTools
sploitableTools.subtitle: Creating a Pentesting Tools Framework
sploitableTools.description: Creating a Framework composed of Python scripts for Pentesting. The goal is to introduce Cybersecurity to IT students with easy-to-understand scripts.
